website_summaries.verdict: A good overall tire shine spray with a very simple, quick application process.
pros: The unique spray formula creates a small protective barrier from weather and moisture over the top of the tire's rubber, in addition to creating a good shine
cons: Can dry and leave spots or streaks without wiping off excess liquid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and holds up
customer_reviews.text: Like most I was skeptical about trying a new product however all I can say is wow, this stuff goes on easy, air dries and it LASTS. It’s rained 3 times since I applied it and it’s still there. Will be buying a few more bottles to keep on hand as well as trying more products from TriNova!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 2x longer than foam.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Last twice as long as old foam style!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The only tire spray you need.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer of this tire spray. I've used several other brands in the past. They were messy and took more time to apply. This TriNova spray is really quick to simply spray on. It smells nice. And best yet, it has lasting power. I get at least two weeks of dark tires with a deep shine.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Gets my tires shinier than any other product I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tire shone product I have ever used. It beats all the in store available ones I have bought in the past. I like that I can just spray it on and leave it and it gets shinier as it dries. Also the shiine last longer than others I have used. Have bought this product 3 or 4 times now!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Tired had the “wet” look for several days, including some rain. Don’t buy the store (auto zone,etc...) car detailing supplies. Spend a little extra and get what you pay for...you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drying left uneven spotty patches with no shine...
customer_reviews.text: After applying an even coat I noticed patches of the tire completely dried showing no shine. Instead, there were spots left behind needing the tired to be completely wiped to get an even shine. I thought the purpose of this spray was not having to wipe the tire, I guess that wasn’t true. Update: After a brief rain storm I noticed the following day the tire shine was almost completely gone. It seems like this product does not last at all
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery. Everything wet including my pendrive.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was really bad. Already almost 1/10 of my wheel shine liquid is wasted. Other accompanying delivered item including my pen drive and iPhone tempered glass were wet. Most likely the pen drive is not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Gazi Adil

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely great product. I got so scared once I first applied it because it was white and my whole tire was white, but it said to leave it on for 15 minutes and then wipe off any residue. I did, and oh my do my tires look nice. They look brand new and if you want, give your rims a nice spray from a distance and they well shine too. Really a great product. (Audi a6, Pirelli tires, Niche Rims)
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased due to ratings and online recommendation of long lasting. Product has a lot of overspray during application and takes an extended time to dry. Even after wiping off excess, product was slung onto my auto when I drove it the next day. Initially, it looked great, however after washing my car the next day I can’t really see any shine at all. I did not spray the tires directly with water. Product states it will retain gloss look longer than any similar product on the market. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Man

customer_reviews.title: Shine, baby, shine.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a tire cleaner, its a tire shine. So, if you spray it on your dirty tires you will get shiny (but dirty) tires. But as a tire shine, it works very well. It also survives a couple of car washes as well. The only think I caution is to be careful where you put this stuff on. It WILL stain your driveway (read the directions). After that first experience, I generally spray it on a microfiber towel and wipe the tires. Saves product and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pandorum

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The package came in a broken plastic bag, without the pump. Easy to use it. So far it looks ok. The applicator was useful, but falling apart, maybe will last another 2-3 applications. It’s been 6 days since I used it and the tires look nice. There were few heavy rains, but didn’t wash the shiny look. Only one concern is that the bottle came without the pump, so I had to buy a bottle with pump and put it there. That’s why is 4 stars. I will update, how many days will stay on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Rain or snow they will still shine!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same time I ordered new tires. I applied the tire shine on Saturday and it rained both Saturday and Sunday. Today (Monday) it snowed half the day and rained the rest of the day and my tires still look shiny. For a high shine you spray and leave it. For a medium shine you spray and wipe down. I did the medium shine method and they still look the same after rain and snow. Trinova also sent me a free sample of leather conditioner for doing a simple survey. Have not yet tried it but seems like a pretty good company so far. As for the tire shine, this is the best I've ever tried hands down
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: No way
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe anything positive about this product if you know anything about tire shine products. It’s watery as if frozen and thawed. Doesn’t stick to tires but lays there in blotches. Horrible shine , no where near many much less expensive brands. Overall a huge disappointment. Going to try and return
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - But Rinse Excess Off of the Driveway
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an aerosol tire shine product that I didn't really like. I admire what it did to my tires, they look great. I do not admire the new stains on the driveway. As it turns out, despite having no warning about it, this product can stain concrete if you leave the excess. I was not aware of that, and so didn't bother to put a lot of effort into rinsing the driveway where the product made contact. Hopefully that isn't too permanent... A simple warning would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Apply this to cleaned tires that are dry and not too warm or hot and you will have clean, black tires for quite some time! The high gloss look fades after a few days but it stays a very nice semi-gloss or satin deep black for a while. Only if you drive through dirt or rocky paths will you have to touch it up really. I drove hundreds of highway miles with great looking tires thanks to this. It's not pricey either. It's only maybe twice as expensive as the crap you'd get anywhere else and it is easily twice as good. Get it. Less sensitive to runs too. Easiest application I've yet to encounter and longevity best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Tech.Tennis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use tire shine
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a water based tire shine product because of issues with petroleum based ones. I had read how they are harmful to the long time use on tires but more specifically they caused my white lettering to yellow after putting them on. I had used Armorall for years but on this particular new tires it yellowed the white lettering. The letters did clean up after washing but that also removed the tire shine. The water based Trinova did not yellow the lettering and left the tires looking nice
customer_reviews.author: Greg Liskey

customer_reviews.title: Makes the tires shine like they are wet, easily to apply, recommend doing it in your garage and leaving for an hour
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different tire shines and I have to say this is my favorite. Goes on easily and you just let it sit. I usually try to wash the rims after I spray this on just to make sure there is no residue on the rim to attract brake dust. Tires look great with this on it and last a fairly long time as well. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: It's just average
customer_reviews.text: So after my first application my tires seemed clean but lacked any real "shine" to them. So I waited a few days and really put a good amount on them with the same results. "Average" If you were to compare the shine from this product to wall paint, you have: Flat, Eggshell, Satin, Semi-gloss, & Gloss. I would call this product "Eggshell" { A very mild shine} They have "Total Transformation" right on their bottle. I wish.
customer_reviews.author: PointMan

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I've always use armor all four years, but it never lasted more then an outing. So when on Amazon was reading all the reviews, and of course tire Nova had hundreds. And I went through all the reviews. And it was very inspiring. So I gambled and bought the gallon oh, and I have absolutely no regrets. It stays on through the rain! I wash my car and if I don't wash my wheels just spray them it still stays on! Very good stuff I may end up trying some other other products out. You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever Don't Miss Out!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, why do I say that I will tell you why when I traded my car at the dealership they said "Jesus" what a shine. I replied this how I keep my automobiles. There has been friends and family that looks inside my car/SUV wondering where I get such a shine from? I owe it all to you for assisting me. so I'm ordering more my colleagues are thirsty for more as well. J Duncan
customer_reviews.author: J DUNCAN

customer_reviews.title: A++ Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I was skeptical of the "spray and walk away" idea, but it work amazingly! My tires were disgusting, so I was looking for a product to clean them up. This tire shine was game changing! I quickly washed my tires, applied the tire shine and let dry... dabbing any pooled spots on my tire knobs. The photo I've attached is my truck 4 days after applying this tire shine. Still shiny... wicks water... couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: Where all these 5 star reviews come from?Probably because they offer a 2nd free bottle for it. It is nearly full looking and not convenient to apply, I detail vehicles on the side and I take great pride in my own vehicles appearance and this absolutely does not meet my standard. I wouldnt recommend this if it was free. However, it does smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cobb

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out on this one
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tire blackeners since they came on the market. There have been a few great ones like the Stoner brand and I was hoping this would be in that category. So far it has barely survived one car wash and one rainstorm. Will reapply to see if a second coating helps it last longer. I am applying it to used tires that have never had a blackener applied to them so as I say the jury is still out. Definitely better than Eagle One or Armor All.
customer_reviews.author: MRCBXMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it; having black cars it really bugs me when the tires are gray. It has maximum shine for the first couple days but keeps the tires black for at least a week or two after. I’ve only had it for a few weeks now but I think it’s a solid product. To put it on you can just spray it on the tires and wipe it off your rims (unless you can spray without hitting your rims). You don’t even need to use the sponge that it comes with unless you want a more matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for some good tire shine, but never seemed to find it, until now. Have bottles of Turtle Wax, wet Shine, Armor All shine etc. lots of these products never dry properly and sling off the tire only to get it all over your rocker panels and fenders. Applied this last night on our truck and took a look at it this morning. Excellent! Nice, dry shine. Live in the Phoenix area, so a good tire shine and protectant is a must with the heat. Like all the other reviews say.....great product.
customer_reviews.author: RetVet

customer_reviews.title: Best tire shine product you can get
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time yesterday, and I am very impressed..Sprayed it on tires when I came out of the carwash, and by the time I finished vacuuming and cleaning the inside of the car,it was mostly dry..I padded dry the remaining few droplets, and drove home..Today,the tires look super shiny, showroom level of deep shine I've never seen on the before..Highly recommend this product, just like the other two I have tried so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Nedzad Mehic

customer_reviews.title: Same as the rest
customer_reviews.text: This product was rated as No. 1 however it failed for me. It does not totally dry which allows dust to stick to the surface. Customer service is great and they refunded me in full due to my dissatisfaction. Dupont Teflon Shine is the only product that worked, but it is discontinued......figures.
customer_reviews.author: equinox 5933

customer_reviews.title: Leaves white residue after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Application was very easy. Just spray around the tires 6-8 inches away. I didn’t wipe them dry, just let them sit overnight in the garage. Next day they looked great! Nice even shine. After about 3 days the shine turned to a white residue on all 4 tires. Reapplied product, same results after 3 days. This is a brand new car with brand new tires, and now I feel like they look worse than if I never used this product. Would not buy this product again and will have to try something different.
customer_reviews.author: SWTINKER

customer_reviews.title: Not really shiny
customer_reviews.text: First off, this stuff smells great, like mint and wintergreen. I want a car air freshener with this scent. Second, the coating seems to last. It’s only been a week, but the tires are still clean. Third, the shine is that of a new tire, not the wet look. Last point, there was zero sling onto the car. Great stuff if you are looking for a nice smelling clean tire. Ps, use a good tire cleaner and remove the old brake dust.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tanabe

customer_reviews.title: More a tire conditioner than shine.
customer_reviews.text: I have worked at car washes and been a home detailer for years so have tried tons of tire shines. After testing this a few different occasions I can say that the product provides more a conditioned black look to the tire than the gel shine like glaze. Where this product is good is it's durability, which does last longer than most stuff. That being said, if you want that true shine glaze for your tire... I'd try another product. However, if you just want the dark, clean look for the rubber, this will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Wells

customer_reviews.title: Waste. Washed away
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when you spray it on and let it dry. Used after wheel rubber cleaner. However it did not last after a rain. Looked like nothing was applied after rain. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great tire shine product
customer_reviews.text: Great tire product. It is easy to apply with excellent results. You can wipe it after application to get a more new tire look or let it dry without wiping to get a super shine on your tires. After drying the product does not sling off on your vehicle. I have used a lot of different products on the last 20 years but the Trinova Tire Shine product delivers the best results I have seen. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fine tire shine
customer_reviews.text: Best tire shine I've come across and seems to be worth the extra price above the common tire shines found in auto parts stores. Don't look for this in auto parts stores, they only carry the cheap stuff. It does leave marks on the ground from spraying the bottom part of your tires, so either drive on to some cardboard or apply in an area where you don't care if it marks the ground.
customer_reviews.author: darjaz

customer_reviews.title: Works good, causes cancer
customer_reviews.text: Smells great like Cherry doctor pepper but don't smell this product guys and girls it causes cancer! There is a warning on the bottle. This will eventually wash off your tires, down the sewer, and in to the public water system. Keep our oceans beautiful, don't use cancer causing chemicals on your car! By the way, sprayer not included. For the price I think a sprayer should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: His stuff is garbage🥴
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money... Unfortunately I purchased 1 gallon... Big mistake... I applied as directed, didn’t drive my truck for two days, the tires looked great ... The second night it rained and washed all this supposedly long lasting tire shine...BS... Off the tires... Anybody who wants the remaining part of the gallon... Let me know just pay the shipping... It’s a freebie
customer_reviews.author: tiger1 robert

customer_reviews.title: Best product that I've used by far
customer_reviews.text: Best product that I've used by far!!! Other products don't even compare. Applies easy, I sprayed it on a tire dressing applicator first so that I could evenly coat the tire. Mine were faded from the sun and from residue left from other tire dressings and this product made them look like brand new! I applied this dressing a few weeks back and they still look like brand new tires just about besides from road dust and dirt on the treads. Would highly recommend this product to anyone and I will definitely be buying other products from the company!!
customer_reviews.author: TheTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great long-lasting product--free promotional cleaning item of your choice not bad either!
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited to have found this product. I previously only purchased Maguire's aerosol spray tire shine. This product is far superior and lasts much longer than its competitors. They also provide a free bottle of one of their cleaning products as a one time promotion per household as well--thank you! Looking forward to trying out their leather conditioner that I got for free. :)
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire Shine!
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding ... your tires will look shiny to the degree of looking wet. There is a caveat ... the "Get Your Next Bottle Free" offer is bogus. TriNova does give you a free something if you take a survey and give them your contact info to be bombarded by ads for other products ... but, not only is thee FREE product NOT another bottle of the product you purchased as promised, it is something not even related nor appealing and I'm guessing not as valuable. Bottom line ... buy this product only if you are OK with only getting ONE bottle of Tire Shine.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime fan!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this product to shine my tires since I was using my truck as my exit vehicle for my wedding. I took a gamble, since Iv never shined my tires before, and I instantly fell in love. The rich, black, liquid color of the rubber shines bright in the sun and looks super sharp. It’s all about prep too, make sure to use brake cleaner or a heavy detergent before application because it does well to repel water and other chemicals, which could lead to splotches on subsequent applications. I just purchased my 3rd bottle and can’t rave enough about it! Amazing product all around
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shine with Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: Applied the product by spraying on the tire and wiping on evenly using the applicator. Was simple to apply taking maybe 10-15 mins total for four tires. I left the tires wet With the solution and did not drive the car overnight. Results were a high shine that does not splatter on the car. 10 days later (minimal driving and no exposure to rain), still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Urso

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I treated the tires on any vehicle of mine (decades). I saw some good reviews on the Trinova product and gave it a try. Man, I couldn't be happier! I am impressed. It goes on as easy as they say; I used a terrycloth towel to daub up any excess. The stuff dried shiny black. Even where the tread meets the road is staying black after about 200 miles.
customer_reviews.author: darkstar

customer_reviews.title: Important DO NOT GET THIS STUFF ON YOUR HANDS  or SKIN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to use protective gear (GLOVES) when using or touching this product! The bottle spilled in my trunk and it got all over my hands when I was tried to clean it up. This stuff is a nightmare once you get it on skin and it will not come off with soap or water. Its been over a month and every time I wash my hands and dry them they feel sticky like glue beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry
customer_reviews.text: Makes your tires look great, but it does sling when driving the car. One of the main reasons I bought this is because it said that it doesn't sling as long as you let it dry. I let it dry for 24 hours and still slingy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic and lasts WEEKS in the Colorado snow and rain!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using tire dressing for years, and nothing even comes close to this stuff!! All of the other brands wear off within hours to days, but no joke, I have driven through two blizzards within a week with this stuff and it still looks like I just put it on yesterday! It holds up like no other product does and looks amazing! My only complaint is it makes the floor EXTREMELY slippery wherever you spray it, so take my advice, apply it on the street, NOT in your garage! This stuff is amazing, I have been using it for years and I plan to keep using it for years!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Best tire shine product available.
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the tire shine products available from all the major brands. TriNova is 100x better than any of them. With the other products, tires are SUPER shiny at first, but after a few days it's gone and you can see the tires are dry cracking. When I first applied TriNova, it didn't seem as shiny as other products. But now, 10 days later, the tires STILL look good/clean, and the tires don't have that dry/rough look. TriNova truly did "restore" the sidewalls. This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Freakbag

customer_reviews.title: Way better than tire foam
customer_reviews.text: product comes with an applicator sponge which i thought tire foam made obsolete. Not so much. as a test I put tire foam on front and tri nova on rear and within 2 days huge difference. Tri nova still looked dark and shiny and tire foam was already wearing off. I think the tire foam turns the rubber yellowish after regular use so not good. Applicator by the way does a great job getting into the tread edge and lettering way better than I expected. Product is well worth the small premium. I will be rebuying.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Murray

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a week.
customer_reviews.text: It makes the tire shiny like new but doesn't last even for a week. I'm very disappointed. I was very hopeful with all the positive reviews that's why I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Marky

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Very horrible bad liquid, doesn't stay and makes everything dirty, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: It dont flig off onto paint
customer_reviews.text: never tried it I was always maguiars or armorall so I picked this up with some new tire applicators and honestly I love it this shit is great goes on smooth it's not messy and and it dont fling off at all I put it on light so it has only a semi gloss finish so the tire looks new and semi wet. I love it no more splatter on my paint. I never heard of this brand so I was like ehhhhh I dont know ya know. Dont wanna waste money but I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: christopher mowinski

customer_reviews.title: Become a believer..this stuff is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine a better product. It lasts and lasts. I washed my car after a week and really did not have to put more on but I did. Maybe more coats will strengthen it more. Technique--I spray it on very lightly....let it set for about 5 minutes...then I use a special tire contoured foam applicator to spread. That is so easy. I can never go back to some of those "shiny slick" products I use to use all those years. With this, you get a lasting satin like finish like you see in a showroom. GET SOME.
customer_reviews.author: Rann

customer_reviews.title: Best tire spray I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I love that it makes my tires look like new without all of the fake gloss of other products, I would me more inclined to call it tire conditioner than tire shine. I was using this on all of the rubber and plastic on my cars until I found Trinova's plastic conditioner, that will be for another review, but let me tell ya...it's quite amazing too! I am very happy with Trinova's tire spray, this is my 3rd order of it! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Passion for Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting and easiest shine spray to use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a no hassle tire shine spray and I saw this had good reviews on Amazon so I gave it a try. It definitely lives up to the hype! Super simple spray that comes out milky white (which helps when you wipe it off the rims) but dries clear. One application and just letting it air dry gives it my preferred level of shine and lasts for 2-3 weeks on average (depending on how much you drive and what the weather is like). 5 outta 5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: joshiga

customer_reviews.title: This Product Shines !!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Elegant design. No smell. Last long like Pro style products. Protects tires from Sun and heat. Good on Vinyl as well. Spray gun works well. Cons: Costly compared to other cheap products that tends to damage tires. Summary - Meant for serious care takes of the car. in line with Eagle one product line.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain_Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about every type of tire shines out there. This one is very easy to apply and as it cures, it covers all of the tire. First used 3 weeks ago. I've washed my truck once, but driven through 4 rains and it still looks decent. This spray does sling even after not driving a full day after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H

customer_reviews.title: Easy product to use and affective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it’s not sticky, it smells amazing, and your tires will shine like never before and Ive used every thing possible. I noticed that within about 3 or 4 days the tires were still deep black but not as shiny as day one. That’s obviously to be expected with any product and after a good rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Gazing Glass Tires
customer_reviews.text: Good afternoon I pray all is well. I just wanted to thank you for "actually" sending me a free sample of your product. I've attached a copy of what I received. I'm excited and I can't wait to try it. My tires were sprayed again the Tuesday. I waited until they dried and they are "still gazing glass", lol. I like your product so far. Thanks again. I'm looking forward to using more of your products. May your company continue to strive in excellence and be blessed abundantly. A Trinova HAPPY Customer Ps...I recommend this product everyone!
customer_reviews.author: PraznLeprdesta

customer_reviews.title: A real winner!
customer_reviews.text: Applied to my Tacoma truck tires. Liked that it went on more like a mist than a spray. Sprayed on, waited for 5 - 10 minutes and wiped over with the sponge applicator (that I didn’t realize I was getting with the spray) just to spread evenly without removing too much. It’s been on the tires for about a week now and still looks good. The shine isn’t real extreme but does look like the tires have been taken care of. I would rate this product along with the big names and I would not hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: T-MAC

customer_reviews.title: Better than others!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire shine! Leaves tires with a rich deep black color that is semi glossy/semi matte finish and lasts longer than other sprays I’ve used. Also has almost zero overspray which is great. The applicator sponge it comes with makes applying the product simple and speeds up the process. Extra bonus, it smells like bubblegum and not like some weird gross chemical. Would highly recommend! (Photos are product after it has dried a full 24 hrs, one coat)
customer_reviews.author: Jake Eko

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the sponge
customer_reviews.text: did not come with the sponge in the photo, hard to apply without it but looks goon when on tires when used for about a day before it comes off the next day
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, shines nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new vehicle and wanted a product that matches what my dealer uses. Easy to apply, has lasted thru two rains so far, and has a pleasant scent I prefer to apply with a well seasoned 2 inch paint brush instead of the included applicator. I'm pleased to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: The SHINIEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my I cannot believe how shiny this makes my tires. I have a black 2019 Mercedes that is washed for free at the dealer. I asked what they use to make the tires look so shiny and new. It's This product. I purchased it to use when I go wash my car other than the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Grossman

customer_reviews.title: average at best
customer_reviews.text: this does not leave a gloss shine on either of my vehicles. I have gotten a better shine from regular items on the shelf at stores.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: A solid 5-star tire shine
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the market for the best tire shine for years now. Tried a dozen but nothing seems to meet my expectations. Did a lot of reseach and stumbled upon this product. I read a lot of great reviews so I decided to give it a try. This product produces the best shine among all the tire shine sprays I've used! I just let my tires soak with the cloudy liquid and after a minute, it becomes really glossy like magic! I already bought my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vendivel

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because it lasts longer than other brands that I've tried. It also comes with a free applicator. I gave it four stars on Style because it's really thin and if you're not careful it tends to run. When you develop a technique however this is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MKT

customer_reviews.title: This product was absolutely amazing, I applied it yesterday and after driving through ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely amazing, I applied it yesterday and after driving through a bit of rain today the shine has not faltered! I love how easy it is to apply, this has to be the best aspect about it. You simply spray it on and leave it to dry for an extreme shine(took a little over 30 minutes for me), some of the product does drip onto your rims but just make sure to wipe that off if it does happen. The price made me want to go for something less expensive but this was one of my best purchases through Amazon, very happy and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this product is 5 stars all around. The shine stays on for a LONG time. I clean my car frequently & only once in a while do I spray this tire shine. I’ve had this product for a year now & my tired have yet to fade & look worn out. If you’re frequent with it, the shine/deep black color will stay on for a month or even longer. Don't look anywhere else, this is the real deal & so worth the price. The face of tires look constantly new. Its also held up in rain pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Wipe.
customer_reviews.text: This says it’s a no-wipe product. Uh... no. If you spritz this directly onto your tire it’s going to bead up and run everywhere. Instead, I sprayed a generous amount onto a shop rag and “painted” it on to the tire. This method worked beautifully and after sitting for 15 minutes my tires looked great with a medium shine.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, with no effort, just spray it on, and it makes the tires look better than new. My driveway is almost 1/2 mile of gravel road and the dust doesn't stick to the tires as with other tire shine products, keeping them cleaner longer. THANK YOU Trinova, you have secured me as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: PB in WA

customer_reviews.title: Great shine without the stickiness that a lot of other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shine without the stickiness that a lot of other tire dressings have. Instructions say to spray on the tire; common sense says don't do that, unless you like cleaning overspray off your paint and wheels, or worse, get it on the tread and cause a crash. Instead spray it on a rag, as you should with any tire dressing, and then wipe it on the tire sidewall. Once dry it doesn't fling onto the paint and it lasts fairly long. As an added bonus it smells nice, like a mix of bubble gum and mint.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Q. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good tire shine treatment
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The wide spray is a bit too much for low profile/performance tires. As others have said it does temporarily stain concrete if you over spray. I like the ability to choose what you're of finish you want with how you apply it. (Spray and leave = gloss, using applicator = semi gloss or spray and wipe for a matte finish) Will update if I have any issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Thermopylae

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used tons of products and this is a good one. I'm not real happy with the life of the shine but I do like the fact that if you do what the instructions say to do, you will not get a lot of sling. When I say a lot, I mean very little but I still get some and I let it dry at least 30 minutes and I wipe off the excess.
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: Great shine. Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Applied product like directions say to and it performed great. I read a previous review about the product looking milky once sprayed on the tire and staying that way. It is not true. It does spray out looking like milk but if you want the maximum shine, spray on and let dry for 15-20 minutes. The white milky color will dry clear and leave your tires looking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Luna

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect it to rain on this past Friday (5-17-19), but it did on Friday and Saturday. I applied the dressing on Friday, it rained (tires still shining), it rained Saturday and Sunday and the tire dressing is still there. I'm blown away. I've never seen a tire dressing that can last this long, especially after rain. Can I recommend? Absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: Donony

customer_reviews.title: Save money by getting the wet look yourself
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say it’s no whipe... but buy a sponge at a dollar store and go wild. So far it’s been about 2 weeks since the application and the tires still look pretty good. This wet look looks better and last longer than what you will get a car wash. This also saved me money as I don’t elect to go for premium washes to get the wet tire look. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Shine doesn't last for me
customer_reviews.text: Been using this on my car and my wife's and it looks great for a day then the shine is pretty much gone by day two. Have definitely used ones that lasted longer and since it claims to last at least a week i'm pretty disappointed with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: After spraying it, it’ll look milky white for a couple of minutes before you see the effect.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I only used it once. Actually I did a car wash 2 days ago and I brushed my tire and applied the product. So far so good. It’s shiny and seems like it’s long lasting. However, I only used it 2 days ago so I wouldn’t wanna give it a full-star comment. I’ll see how it works on my tires in the next few days or maybe few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chen

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Tire Shine Spray
customer_reviews.text: Clean tires before applying product. No need for excessive use when applying. I prefer spraying on applicator then rub in tires and let dry to avoid slinging. Tires look clean with satin sheen smooth and new without the oily wet sticky look.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, black, shiniest on the market! Lasts longer than competing products.
customer_reviews.text: Spray it on, wipe off any excess, then leave it for 30 minutes to dry. It’ll leave your tires black, and shiny as glass. It lasts for about a week of daily driving. Very happy with this product! Wish it lasted longer, but... it lasts longer than any other competitor tire shine solution.
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is no joke. It works great and much easier to apply than anything I have used in the past. Longevity I wouldn't know. I'll keep the review updated. I did try spraying it off after it dried and it didn't wash off. So that is good news.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Better than Meguiars or ArmorAll
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I had never heard of this product, but I felt that way about Invisible Glass at first. This stuff SHINES, STICKS, and STAYS! Fun to drive around with it on the tires, makes even my oldest car look great!
customer_reviews.author: chucky d

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first read about this thinking it was just another product but this stuff is great! I just spray on the tires after cleaning my car and then you really notice how much of a big difference clean tires can make. I have an all black car with black wheels and I was amazed when I saw how much better the car looked with shiny clean wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Application is easy and seems to last long. Here is my experience on new tires in Texas summer: 1st week - Shine and wet look is spectacular 2nd week - Starts to dull but still looks good 3rd week - Still present but mostly faded I end up reapplying on week 3, but even then, my tires are still wetter looking than most tires on the road.
customer_reviews.author: nerdnic

customer_reviews.title: One and only profession application for tires
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried many other products and the tire shine is by far the best I've ever used on my Corvette and my Ram truck I get complimented every time I use it on my vehicles and I recommend it to everyone thanks for a great product and will try other products from Trinova😎
customer_reviews.author: Pete Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: So many tire care products say they are "no sling"......this one is the best! Looks great, goes on easy, and does not sling at highway speeds. I let the car sit overnight before driving after I apply. No complaints. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall K. Posey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been 3 weeks since I washed my car and the tires are still on point. Will come off in a significant rain however. Application is amazing, super easy spay on, wipe off rims (cause I have aiming issues), then forget about. Makes dressing big and burly tires much much easier than a gel. Give it a try, you will be impressed. Extra cost is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DSki

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product works well but the spray bottle version always gets clogged so be sure to buy a better bottle or use with an applicator. The products makes wheel have a nice OEM shine and it lasts a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi Viswanathan

customer_reviews.title: YOU WANT SLING YOU WON'T FIND IT HERE
customer_reviews.text: Started with a small bottle .Still have half a bottle left after about 50 applications. Ordered a gallon so I never run out.For best results. Clean tires with scrub brush and detergent.. Then wipe with towel, rinse and dry. Use a foam applicator to apply . Let dry 4 at least 30 minutes. It will have a high shine which will turn to satin after 3 or 4 days. Apply every other week and then every 3rd week after 3 or 4 apps. The best part? It won't sling all over the side of your car! Cooler temps may require longer dry times. 30 minutes is based on 75 degrees and higher
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great tire shine product
customer_reviews.text: Great tire shine , deep black shine, included tire foam applicator was a nice bonus, tires stayed nice after a few showers , I’m a fan of tri nova for life as I use their waterless car wash and wax and that is the best !
customer_reviews.author: Porschbox

customer_reviews.title: Very easy application.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well. Smells sweet to mask the stinky garage. Makes the tires look great. I also spray it in my plastics for a long shine inside the wheel well and on the rear Plastic bumper. Second year I have bought this and haven’t found anything that applies so easily.
customer_reviews.author: GTruRevue

customer_reviews.title: Last just a few days.  Pants on Fire claims.
customer_reviews.text: Washed my car, cleaned the tires and sprayed this on and left it to dry. The tires were incredibly shiny, for less than a week. After a few days the tires were just as dull as before applying this product. I would judge their claims of weeks of shiny tires as Pants On FIre.
customer_reviews.author: William Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people who believe your car is a reflection of you. I have been using tire shine for years. I have used many products and my last one I was using for years. I tried Trinova and the results sold me on this product. Results last longer than other products, it does take longer to dry, but worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Bill Willett

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not worth the investment. It slings everywhere no matter how you try to safeguard the grooves. Shine only lasted 2 days and slung off in the rain. Much better products out there available through Amazon. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Smoothcab

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well Use this on inside flooring in a high traffic area. The flooring is dri dek used on fishing boats to keep deck from being slippery we use it inside a bathhouse attached to a pool keeps it shiny like new!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best gloss, finish
customer_reviews.text: I use a drive thru car wash with a tire shine however, it did not get the gloss and shine I was looking for. This product does not even require the applicator to provide a clean and shiny look. I have tried other products, and this seems to produce a long and lasting shine that I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Zufelt

customer_reviews.title: Shines Tires & Refreshes Plastic
customer_reviews.text: This product gives a nice shine. I used it two days in a row, because I just put new tires on my truck. Like any spray bottle shine product, spray to the side when applying so it’s even in glossy when it dries. I used it also to enhance any plastic on my truck, the mud flaps and my truck bed cover! Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my 14 year old car sparkle!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 year old BMW X5 and while it is pretty good condition, this product helps make the black trim shine! I sprayed it on the tires and trim pieces that are part of the running boards and front and rear bumper and it just brings the black to life, makes it look sharp! It was so easy to use and has quite a pleasant smell. I did not find the product greasy and went on smoothly. I would definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I like my tires super shiny. It was really easy to use. Just spray on the tire and use the included sponge to spread it around and leave it to dry for about half an hour. Lasted about 3'ish weeks at the maximum shine
customer_reviews.author: rizmo

customer_reviews.title: Greatly outshines a number of other tire shine sprays
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other tire shine sprays through out the years but none of them gave my tires a shine anywhere close to this! I tried it out after giving my car a much needed wash. It sprays on the tire easily. After wiping off any spray that managed to make its way onto the rim/surrounding body panel, I just let it sit over night. The following morning my old, worn out tires looked brand new! You would think I just rolled out of the dealership’s lot. Will be using this on my tires from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Tires looking great and fresh again. Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical as i was applying this product to the tires. I was very impressed with the results though. Tires are looking great and fresh again. Perfect darkness, color, and shine. You may need to get a towel to rub on some of the spots that you might have missed or didn't get the run off from spraying, but it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: m-

customer_reviews.title: tires still have a like new look and the product appears to be holding ...
customer_reviews.text: I applied the product on Saturday. Five days later, tires still have a like new look and the product appears to be holding up. 5 Days is already longer than anything else I have tried. We'll see what happens from here, but I am satisfied with what I see, I am more interested in a new tire look rather than a fake shine that goes away. I'm not trying to win a car show, just want the tires to stay looking like the day I bought the vehicle and this product suits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TriNova Tire Shine Spray No Wipe - Automotive Clear Coat Dressing for Wet & Slick Finish - Keeps Tires Black - with Rubber Protector - Prevents Fading & Yellowing - 18 OZ
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR TIRES A SLICK FINISH – TriNova’s Tire Shine Spray is the easiest way to give your tires the dark and shiny look you want. Say goodbye to those faded and dusty tires

ADVANCED COATING & PROTECTION – Not only will this spray give your tires the shine you’re looking for, it’ll also protect them from other deteriorating signs of aging. With just a single coating of this Tire Shine, your rubber tires will be guarded agains

REPELS DIRT & GRIME – TriNova’s Tire Shine Spray also offers additional protection against outside elements that can ruin your car’s appearance and also damage your tires along the way. With this spray, you won’t have to worry about water spots or salt st

GET THE SHINE YOU WANT – High shine, medium shine or low shine, with this spray you can achieve whichever level of shine you want. Doing so is easy: the longer you leave the spray on your tires, the more shine you’ll see when you wipe it off.

ACHIEVE A SHINE THAT LASTS – Unlike other shine sprays, you won’t have to apply TriNova’s Tire Shine Spray multiple times a week. With this product, your tires will get a gloss that lasts longer than that you’d get from any other product on the market. In

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,665 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
